about_the_game:
Someone on space station 52 is monstrously murdering its denizens and leaving keys in their wounds.

In this strange place, filled with even stranger beings, Edward Locke will discover more about himself than he ever could have imagined. Join him as he explores a hand-drawn, richly conceived world: filled with danger, mystery, creativity and memorable moments.

FEATURES
  • A murder mystery investigation with evidence collection and suspect interrogation.
  • A unique hand-drawn world full of perilous situations and unbelievable mysteries.
  • Fun and challenging puzzles that will challenge your solving skills.
  • Full voiceover for the entire charismatic cast.
  • All original, blues inspired cinematic soundtrack.

content_descriptors.notes: Fantasy violence dealing with murder and crime scenes. Some intense themes and imagery. Mild sexual references and humor.

detailed_description:
Someone on space station 52 is monstrously murdering its denizens and leaving keys in their wounds.

In this strange place, filled with even stranger beings, Edward Locke will discover more about himself than he ever could have imagined. Join him as he explores a hand-drawn, richly conceived world: filled with danger, mystery, creativity and memorable moments.

FEATURES
  • A murder mystery investigation with evidence collection and suspect interrogation.
  • A unique hand-drawn world full of perilous situations and unbelievable mysteries.
  • Fun and challenging puzzles that will challenge your solving skills.
  • Full voiceover for the entire charismatic cast.
  • All original, blues inspired cinematic soundtrack.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Single Core Processor or 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 1 GB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15 Catalina or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Murder On Space Station 52 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Trapped on a space station with the Keychain Killer you must unravel this mystery, or it will be your last. Collect evidence, interrogate suspects and solve puzzles to stand a chance.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
